statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, total_purchases, customer_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT total_points, customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT total_purchases, customer_name, total_points, customer_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_purchases BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY total_purchases ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id IN (3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND total_purchases > 3;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM Rewards ORDER BY reward_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spend FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spend > 500;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT loyalty_points, total_purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgram JOIN PurchaseHistory ON LoyaltyProgram.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM Rewards WHERE required_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY required_points;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount + loyalty_points AS total_points FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE total_purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, reward_points, reward_date FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, reward_points FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY total_purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_amount, p.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, claim_date FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id LEFT JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_name like 'A%' ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name, redeemed_date FROM customers c JOIN customer_rewards cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON cr.reward_id = r.reward_id ORDER BY redeemed_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers c LEFT JOIN loyalty_tiers lt ON c.loyalty_points >= lt.required_points ORDER BY lt.required_points ASC;
